jianzhi-offer/lian-xu-zi-shu-zu-zui-da-h: 15,1,2,2},连续子向量的最大和为8(从第0个开始,到第3个为止)。给一个数组，返回它的最大连续子序列的和。(子向量的长度至少是1)
若某一环加上新元素得到的now_sum为负值，直接舍弃，从0开始；正值则继续保留，哪怕比前一环小。
计算连续子向量的最大和,当向量全为正数的时候,问题很好解决。但是,如果向量中包含负数,是否应该包含某个负数,并期望旁边的正数会弥补它呢？

求该青蛙跳上一个n级的台阶总共有多少种跳法。

求1+2+3+...+n，要求不能使用乘除法、for、while、if、else、switch、case等关键字及条件判断语句（a?b:c）。
jianzhi-offer/ju-xing-fu-gai.html: 我们可以用2*1的小矩形横着或者竖着去覆盖更大的矩形。请问用n个2*1的小矩形无重叠地覆盖一个2*n的大矩形，总共有多少种方法？
用递归其实思路更简单，但是python递归太慢了，oj会判超时。

./.title: Preface
./.summary: This page is to record my leetcode exercise.
./.body:
Preface
刷题记录。
頑張った！💪🏻Offer快到碗里来～～

algorithm/.title: Algorithms
algorithm/.body:
Algorithms
Leetcode 数据结构与算法

sql/175.-zu-he-liang-ge-biao-jian-dan.ht.title: 175.(Easy) 组合两个表
sql/175.-zu-he-liang-ge-biao-jian-dan.ht.body:
175.(Easy) 组合两个表
SELECT p.FirstName, p.LastName, a.City, a.State
FROM Person p LEFT JOIN Address a
    ON p.PersonId = a.PersonId

sql/176.-di-er-gao-de-xin-shui-jian-dan..title: 176.(Easy) 第二高的薪水
sql/176.-di-er-gao-de-xin-shui-jian-dan..summary: 要求如果不存在第二高的薪水，查询应返回 null。
sql/176.-di-er-gao-de-xin-shui-jian-dan..body:
176.(Easy) 第二高的薪水
Query1
SELECT DISTINCT Salary AS SecondHighestSalary
FROM Employee
ORDER BY Salary DESC
LIMIT 1,1

无法返回NULL
 
Query2
SELECT (
    SELECT DISTINCT Salary 
    FROM Employee
    ORDER BY Salary DESC
    LIMIT 1,1
) AS SecondHighestSalary

在 query1外嵌套另一个SELECT子句，即可在空表适返回NULL

sql/177.-dingao-de-xin-shui-zhong-deng.h.title: 177.(Medium) 第N高的薪水
sql/177.-dingao-de-xin-shui-zhong-deng.h.summary: 如果不存在第 n 高的薪水，那么查询应返回 null。
sql/177.-dingao-de-xin-shui-zhong-deng.h.body:
177.(Medium) 第N高的薪水
Salary
+----+--------+
| Id | Salary |
+----+--------+
| 1  | 100    |
| 2  | 200    |
| 3  | 300    |
+----+--------+

LIMIT 无法直接和 N-1 一起使用 ，故需要在函数里(line 3)提前设N = N-1
CREATE FUNCTION getNthHighestSalary(N INT) RETURNS INT
BEGIN
  SET N = N - 1;
  RETURN (
      # Write your MySQL query statement below.
      SELECT DISTINCT Salary
      FROM Employee
      ORDER BY Salary DESC
      LIMIT N,1
  );
END

sql/180.-lian-xu-chu-xian-de-shu-zi-zhon.title: 180.(Medium) 连续出现的数字
sql/180.-lian-xu-chu-xian-de-shu-zi-zhon.body:
180.(Medium) 连续出现的数字
Logs
+----+-----+
| Id | Num |
+----+-----+
| 1  |  1  |
| 2  |  1  |
| 3  |  1  |
| 4  |  2  |
| 5  |  1  |
| 6  |  2  |
| 7  |  2  |
+----+-----+

Output
+-----------------+
| ConsecutiveNums |
+-----------------+
| 1               |
+-----------------+

连续出现3次的数字。
SELECT 
    DISTINCT a.Num AS ConsecutiveNums
FROM 
    Logs a, Logs b, Logs c
WHERE
    a.Id = b.Id + 1 AND
    a.Id = c.Id + 2 AND
    a.Num = b.Num AND
    a.Num = c.Num

sql/181.-chao-guo-jing-li-shou-ru-de-yua.title: 181.(Easy) 超过经理收入的员工
sql/181.-chao-guo-jing-li-shou-ru-de-yua.body:
181.(Easy) 超过经理收入的员工
SELECT 
    e1.Name AS Employee
FROM 
    Employee e1 LEFT JOIN
    Employee e2 ON
    e1.ManagerId = e2.Id
WHERE 
    e1.Salary > e2.Salary

sql/182.-cha-zhao-zhong-fu-de-dian-zi-yo.title: 182.(Easy) 查找重复的电子邮箱
sql/182.-cha-zhao-zhong-fu-de-dian-zi-yo.body:
182.(Easy) 查找重复的电子邮箱
SELECT 
    Email
FROM
    Person
GROUP BY Email
Having count(1) > 1

sql/183.-cong-bu-ding-gou-de-ke-hu-jian-.title: 183.(Easy) 从不订购的客户
sql/183.-cong-bu-ding-gou-de-ke-hu-jian-.body:
183.(Easy) 从不订购的客户
SELECT c.Name AS Customers
FROM 
    Customers c LEFT JOIN Orders o
    ON c.Id = o.CustomerId
WHERE o.Id IS NULL

sql/184.-bu-men-gong-zi-zui-gao-de-yuan-.title: 184.(Medium) 部门工资最高的员工
sql/184.-bu-men-gong-zi-zui-gao-de-yuan-.body:
184.(Medium) 部门工资最高的员工
Employee 
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
| Id | Name  | Salary | DepartmentId |
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
| 1  | Joe   | 70000  | 1            |
| 2  | Jim   | 90000  | 1            |
| 3  | Henry | 80000  | 2            |
| 4  | Sam   | 60000  | 2            |
| 5  | Max   | 90000  | 1            |
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
Department
+----+----------+
| Id | Name     |
+----+----------+
| 1  | IT       |
| 2  | Sales    |
+----+----------+

Output
+------------+----------+--------+
| Department | Employee | Salary |
+------------+----------+--------+
| IT         | Max      | 90000  |
| IT         | Jim      | 90000  |
| Sales      | Henry    | 80000  |
+------------+----------+--------+

SELECT 
    d.Name AS Department,
    e.Name AS Employee,
    e.Salary AS Salary
FROM
    Employee e,
    Department d
WHERE e.DepartmentId = d.Id AND
      (d.Id,e.Salary) IN (SELECT DepartmentId, MAX(Salary) 
                            FROM Employee
                            GROUP BY DepartmentId)

用了subquery选取各个部门的最大薪资，而不是在原query里直接用GROUP BY + MAX()，是因为同部门的最大薪资可能有多个人。

sql/untitled-1.html.title: 185.(Hard) 部门工资前三高的员工
sql/untitled-1.html.body:
185.(Hard) 部门工资前三高的员工
Employee
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
| Id | Name  | Salary | DepartmentId |
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
| 1  | Joe   | 85000  | 1            |
| 2  | Henry | 80000  | 2            |
| 3  | Sam   | 60000  | 2            |
| 4  | Max   | 90000  | 1            |
| 5  | Janet | 69000  | 1            |
| 6  | Randy | 85000  | 1            |
| 7  | Will  | 70000  | 1            |
+----+-------+--------+--------------+
Department
+----+----------+
| Id | Name     |
+----+----------+
| 1  | IT       |
| 2  | Sales    |
+----+----------+

Output
+------------+----------+--------+
| Department | Employee | Salary |
+------------+----------+--------+
| IT         | Max      | 90000  |
| IT         | Randy    | 85000  |
| IT         | Joe      | 85000  |
| IT         | Will     | 70000  |
| Sales      | Henry    | 80000  |
| Sales      | Sam      | 60000  |
+------------+----------+--------+

Step 1 选出整体的top 3薪水
意味着对于选出的salary，比它大的不超过3个
SELECT 
    e1.Salary
FROM 
    Employee e1
WHERE 3 > (SELECT
                COUNT(DISTINCT e2.Salary)
           FROM 
                Employee e2
           WHERE
                e2.Salary > e1.Salary)

这里如果把line 5的 3 > 换成

n > , 相当于 top n
n = , 相当于 第 n + 1

Step 2 结合部门信息的top 3
SELECT 
    d.Name Department,
    e1.Name Employee,
    e1.Salary Salary
FROM 
    Employee e1 INNER JOIN Department d
    ON e1.DepartmentId = d.Id           
WHERE 3 > (SELECT
               COUNT(DISTINCT e2.Salary)
           FROM
               Employee e2
           WHERE
               e1.Salary

sql/196.easy-shan-chu-zhong-fu-de-dian-z.title: 196.(Easy) 删除重复的电子邮箱
sql/196.easy-shan-chu-zhong-fu-de-dian-z.body:
196.(Easy) 删除重复的电子邮箱
+----+------------------+
| Id | Email            |
+----+------------------+
| 1  | john@example.com |
| 2  | bob@example.com  |
| 3  | john@example.com |
+----+------------------+

DELETE p1 FROM Person p1,
    Person p2
WHERE
    p1.Email = p2.Email AND p1.Id > p2.Id

sql/197.-shang-sheng-de-wen-du-jian-dan..title: 197.(Easy) 上升的温度
sql/197.-shang-sheng-de-wen-du-jian-dan..body:
197.(Easy) 上升的温度
MySQL
SELECT w1.Id
FROM
    Weather w1 LEFT JOIN
    Weather w2 
    ON DATEDIFF(w1.RecordDate,w2.RecordDate) = 1
WHERE
    w1.Temperature > w2.Temperature

Oracle
SELECT w1.Id
FROM
    Weather w1 LEFT JOIN
    Weather w2 
    ON w2.RecordDate = w1.RecordDate - 1 
WHERE
    w1.Temperature > w2.Temperature

MySQL 用DATEDIFF(d1,d2)来表示d1 - d2，Oracle里可以直接对date做加减运算。

sql/262.-hang-cheng-he-yong-hu-kun-nan.h.title: 262.(Hard) 行程和用户
sql/262.-hang-cheng-he-yong-hu-kun-nan.h.body:
262.(Hard) 行程和用户
Trips
+----+-----------+-----------+---------+--------------------+----------+
| Id | Client_Id | Driver_Id | City_Id |        Status      |Request_at|
+----+-----------+-----------+---------+--------------------+----------+
| 1  |     1     |    10     |    1    |     completed      |2013-10-01|
| 2  |     2     |    11     |    1    | cancelled_by_driver|2013-10-01|
| 3  |     3     |    12     |    6    |     completed      |2013-10-01|
| 4  |     4     |    13     |    6    | cancelled_by_client|2013-10-01|
| 5  |     1     |    10     |    1    |     completed      |2013-10-02|
| 6  |     2     |    11     |    6    |     completed      |2013-10-02|
| 7  |     3     |    12     |    6    |     completed      |2013-10-02|
| 8  |     2     |    12     |    12   |     completed      |2013-10-03|
| 9  |     3     |    10     |    12   |     completed      |2013-10-03| 
| 10 |     4     |    13     |    12   | cancelled_by_driver|2013-10-03|
+----+-----------+-----------+---------+--------------------+----------+
Users
+----------+--------+--------+
| Users_Id | Banned |  Role  |
+----------+--------+--------+
|    1     |   No   | client |
|    2     |   Yes  | client |
|    3     |   No   | client |
|    4     |   No   | client |
|    10    |   No   | driver |
|    11    |   No   | driver |
|    12    |   No   | driver |
|    13    |   No   | driver |
+----------+--------+--------+

Output
+------------+-------------------+
|     Day    | Cancellation Rate |
+------------+-------------------+
| 2013-10-01 |       0.33        |
| 2013-10-02 |       0.00        |
| 2013-10-03 |       0.50        |
+------------+-------------------+

SELECT
    t.request_at AS Day,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN status <> 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(t.id),2) AS 'Cancellation Rate'
FROM
    Trips t LEFT JOIN
    Users u1 ON t.client_id = u1.users_id LEFT JOIN
    Users u2 ON t.driver_id = u2.users_id
WHERE 
    u2.banned = 'No' AND u1.banned = 'No' AND
    t.request_at BETWEEN '2013-10-01' AND '2013-10-03'
GROUP BY
    t.request_at

这题有毒。。。
按理说“非禁止用户的取消率“应该要考虑cancelled by who的，毕竟driver和client都在Users表里。然而测试用例只是去掉了所有banned用户的订单，然后只要是非completed的订单全都算做分子管他谁cancel的。这么一搞这题其实算不上困难了。
场景挺不错的，如果题意明确一点，可以设计成一道比较复杂的题。

sql/511.-game-play-analysisi-jian-dan.ht.title: 511.(Easy) Game Play Analysis I
sql/511.-game-play-analysisi-jian-dan.ht.body:
511.(Easy) Game Play Analysis I
SELECT 
    player_id, 
    MIN(event_date) first_login
FROM Activity
GROUP BY player_id

sql/512.-game-play-analysis-ii-jian-dan..title: 512.(Easy) Game Play Analysis II
sql/512.-game-play-analysis-ii-jian-dan..body:
512.(Easy) Game Play Analysis II
SELECT
    player_id,
    device_id
FROM
    Activity
WHERE
    (player_id,event_date) IN (SELECT player_id, MIN(event_date) 
                               FROM Activity 
                               GROUP BY player_id)

sql/534.-game-play-analysis-iii-zhong-de.title: 534.(Medium) Game Play Analysis III
sql/534.-game-play-analysis-iii-zhong-de.body:
534.(Medium) Game Play Analysis III
Activity table:
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+
| player_id | device_id | event_date | games_played |
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+
| 1         | 2         | 2016-03-01 | 5            |
| 1         | 2         | 2016-03-02 | 6            |
| 2         | 3         | 2017-06-25 | 1            |
| 3         | 1         | 2016-03-02 | 0            |
| 3         | 4         | 2018-07-03 | 5            |
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+

Result table:
+-----------+------------+---------------------+
| player_id | event_date | games_played_so_far |
+-----------+------------+---------------------+
| 1         | 2016-03-01 | 5                   |
| 1         | 2016-05-02 | 11                  |
| 1         | 2017-06-25 | 12                  |
| 3         | 2016-03-02 | 0                   |
| 3         | 2018-07-03 | 5                   |
+-----------+------------+---------------------+
For the player with id 1, 5 + 6 = 11 games played by 2016-05-02, and 5 + 6 + 1 = 12 games played by 2017-06-25.
For the player with id 3, 0 + 5 = 5 games played by 2018-07-03.
Note that for each player we only care about the days when the player logged in.

SELECT
    a.player_id,
    a.event_date,
    SUM(b.games_played) games_played_so_far
FROM
    Activity a LEFT JOIN Activity b ON 
    b.player_id = a.player_id AND
    b.event_date 
虽然是a left join b，由于是一对多所以最后records数还是超过了表a

sql/550.-game-play-analysis-iv-zhong-den.title: 550.(Medium) Game Play Analysis IV
sql/550.-game-play-analysis-iv-zhong-den.body:
550.(Medium) Game Play Analysis IV
Activity table:
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+
| player_id | device_id | event_date | games_played |
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+
| 1         | 2         | 2016-03-01 | 5            |
| 1         | 2         | 2016-03-02 | 6            |
| 2         | 3         | 2017-06-25 | 1            |
| 3         | 1         | 2016-03-02 | 0            |
| 3         | 4         | 2018-07-03 | 5            |
+-----------+-----------+------------+--------------+

Result table:
+-----------+
| fraction  |
+-----------+
| 0.33      |
+-----------+
Only the player with id 1 logged back in after the first day he had logged in 
so the answer is 1/3 = 0.33

主要思路是找出first day次日有登录记录的用户。

JOIN一个副表b对应次日，若为b为NULL则说明不符合
用WHERE过滤出每个用户的 first day record

SELECT
    ROUND(
        COUNT(b.event_date)/ COUNT(a.player_id),
        2) fraction
FROM
    Activity a LEFT JOIN Activity b ON 
    b.player_id = a.player_id AND
    DATEDIFF(b.event_date,a.event_date) = 1 #b作a的次日
WHERE #first day
    (a.player_id,a.event_date) IN (SELECT player_id, MIN(event_date)
                                   FROM Activity
                                   GROUP BY player_id)

sql/569.hard-yuan-gong-xin-shui-zhong-we.title: 569.(Hard) 员工薪水中位数
sql/569.hard-yuan-gong-xin-shui-zhong-we.body:
569.(Hard) 员工薪水中位数
Employee
+-----+------------+--------+
|Id   | Company    | Salary |
+-----+------------+--------+
|1    | A          | 2341   |
|2    | A          | 341    |
|3    | A          | 15     |
|4    | A          | 15314  |
|5    | A          | 451    |
|6    | A          | 513    |
|7    | B          | 15     |
|8    | B          | 13     |
|9    | B          | 1154   |
|10   | B          | 1345   |
|11   | B          | 1221   |
|12   | B          | 234    |
|13   | C          | 2345   |
|14   | C          | 2645   |
|15   | C          | 2645   |
|16   | C          | 2652   |
|17   | C          | 65     |
+-----+------------+--------+

Output
+-----+------------+--------+
|Id   | Company    | Salary |
+-----+------------+--------+
|5    | A          | 451    |
|6    | A          | 513    |
|12   | B          | 234    |
|9    | B          | 1154   |
|14   | C          | 2645   |
+-----+------------+--------+
median salary for each company

这道题快把我搞死了= = 为什么不能出个median函数
SELECT
    a.id,
    a.company,
    a.salary
FROM
    Employee a LEFT JOIN Employee b ON
    a.company = b.company
GROUP BY a.id
HAVING
    ABS(SUM(CASE 
            WHEN a.salary > b.salary THEN -1  # 小于当前 
            WHEN a.salary  b.id THEN -1 # 相等时按id大小归+-
            ELSE 0 END))

sql/570.medium-zhi-shao-you-5-ming-zhi-j.title: 570.(Medium) 至少有5名直接下属的经理
sql/570.medium-zhi-shao-you-5-ming-zhi-j.body:
570.(Medium) 至少有5名直接下属的经理
Employee
+------+----------+-----------+----------+
|Id    |Name       |Department |ManagerId |
+------+----------+-----------+----------+
|101   |John       |A           |null      |
|102   |Dan       |A           |101       |
|103   |James       |A           |101       |
|104   |Amy       |A           |101       |
|105   |Anne       |A           |101       |
|106   |Ron       |B           |101       |
+------+----------+-----------+----------+

output
+-------+
| Name  |
+-------+
| John  |
+-------+

SELECT name
FROM Employee
WHERE id IN
    (SELECT managerid
    FROM Employee
    GROUP BY managerid
    HAVING COUNT(id) >= 5)

sql/571.hard-gei-ding-shu-zi-de-pin-lv-c.title: 571.(Hard) 给定数字的频率查询中位数
sql/571.hard-gei-ding-shu-zi-de-pin-lv-c.body:
571.(Hard) 给定数字的频率查询中位数
Numbers
+----------+-------------+
|  Number  |  Frequency  |
+----------+-------------|
|  0       |  7          |
|  1       |  1          |
|  2       |  3          |
|  3       |  1          |
+----------+-------------+
000000012223

output
+--------+
| median |
+--------|
| 0.0000 |
+--------+

又是Median， T - T
SELECT AVG(a.number) median
FROM Numbers a
WHERE a.frequency >= ABS(
    (SELECT SUM(frequency) FROM Numbers WHERE a.number = number))

这位大哥的答案真的名符其实easy peasy了

sql/574.-medium-winning-candidate.html.title: 574.(Medium) Winning Candidate
sql/574.-medium-winning-candidate.html.body:
574.(Medium) Winning Candidate
 Candidate
+-----+---------+
| id  | Name    |
+-----+---------+
| 1   | A       |
| 2   | B       |
| 3   | C       |
| 4   | D       |
| 5   | E       |
+-----+---------+ 

 Vote
+-----+--------------+
| id  | CandidateId  |
+-----+--------------+
| 1   |     2        |
| 2   |     4        |
| 3   |     3        |
| 4   |     2        |
| 5   |     5        |
+-----+--------------+

output
+------+
| Name |
+------+
| B    |
+------+

Notes:
You may assume there is no tie, in other words 
there will be at most one winning candidate.

SELECT name
FROM Candidate
WHERE id = (SELECT candidateid
            FROM Vote
            GROUP BY candidateid
            ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC
            LIMIT 1)

sql/578.-medium-get-highest-answer-rate-.title: 578.(Medium) Get Highest Answer Rate Question
sql/578.-medium-get-highest-answer-rate-.body:
578.(Medium) Get Highest Answer Rate Question
Get the highest answer rate question from a table survey_log with these columns: uid, action, question_id, answer_id, q_num, timestamp.
uid means user id; action has these kind of values: "show", "answer", "skip"; answer_id is not null when action column is "answer", while is null for "show" and "skip"; q_num is the numeral order of the question in current session.
Write a sql query to identify the question which has the highest answer rate.
Input:
+------+-----------+--------------+------------+-----------+------------+
| uid  | action    | question_id  | answer_id  | q_num     | timestamp  |
+------+-----------+--------------+------------+-----------+------------+
| 5    | show      | 285          | null       | 1         | 123        |
| 5    | answer    | 285          | 124124     | 1         | 124        |
| 5    | show      | 369          | null       | 2         | 125        |
| 5    | skip      | 369          | null       | 2         | 126        |
+------+-----------+--------------+------------+-----------+------------+
Output:
+-------------+
| survey_log  |
+-------------+
|    285      |
+-------------+
Explanation:
question 285 has answer rate 1/1, while question 369 has 0/1 answer rate, so output 285.

SELECT question_id survey_log
FROM survey_log
GROUP BY question_id
ORDER BY COUNT(answer_id) DESC
LIMIT 1

sql/579.-find-cumulative-salary-of-an-em.title: 579.(Hard) Find Cumulative Salary of an Employee
sql/579.-find-cumulative-salary-of-an-em.body:
579.(Hard) Find Cumulative Salary of an Employee
选出每个ID每个月的「过去三个月累计薪水」，排除最近的月份
Employee

| Id | Month | Salary |
|----|-------|--------|
| 1  | 1     | 20     |
| 2  | 1     | 20     |
| 1  | 2     | 30     |
| 2  | 2     | 30     |
| 3  | 2     | 40     |
| 1  | 3     | 40     |
| 3  | 3     | 60     |
| 1  | 4     | 60     |
| 3  | 4     | 70     |

Output

| Id | Month | Salary |
|----|-------|--------|
| 1  | 3     | 90     |
| 1  | 2     | 50     |
| 1  | 1     | 20     |
| 2  | 1     | 20     |
| 3  | 3     | 100    |
| 3  | 2     | 40     |

SELECT
    a.id, 
    a.month,
    SUM(b.salary) Salary
FROM
    Employee a JOIN Employee b ON
    a.id = b.id AND
    a.month - b.month >= 0 AND
    a.month - b.month

sql/580.-medium-count-student-number-in-.title: 580.(Medium) Count Student Number in Departments
sql/580.-medium-count-student-number-in-.body:
580.(Medium) Count Student Number in Departments
student
| Column Name  | Type      |
|--------------|-----------|
| student_id   | Integer   |
| student_name | String    |
| gender       | Character |
| dept_id      | Integer   |

department
| Column Name | Type    |
|-------------|---------|
| dept_id     | Integer |
| dept_name   | String  |

student table:
| student_id | student_name | gender | dept_id |
|------------|--------------|--------|---------|
| 1          | Jack         | M      | 1       |
| 2          | Jane         | F      | 1       |
| 3          | Mark         | M      | 2       |

department table:
| dept_id | dept_name   |
|---------|-------------|
| 1       | Engineering |
| 2       | Science     |
| 3       | Law         |

Output:
| dept_name   | student_number |
|-------------|----------------|
| Engineering | 2              |
| Science     | 1              |
| Law         | 0              |

Note: 输出需要按人数从高到低排序，dept_name按字母表排序。
SELECT
    d.dept_name
    ,COUNT(s.student_id) student_number
FROM
    student s RIGHT JOIN department d ON
    s.dept_id = d.dept_id
GROUP BY
    d.dept_name
ORDER BY
    2 DESC, 1

sql/untitled-2.html.title: 584.(Easy) Find Customer Referee
sql/untitled-2.html.body:
584.(Easy) Find Customer Referee
Write a query to return the list of customers NOT referred by the person with id '2'.Include those has no referee.
customer
+------+------+-----------+
| id   | name | referee_id|
+------+------+-----------+
|    1 | Will |      NULL |
|    2 | Jane |      NULL |
|    3 | Alex |         2 |
|    4 | Bill |      NULL |
|    5 | Zack |         1 |
|    6 | Mark |         2 |
+------+------+-----------+

output
+------+
| name |
+------+
| Will |
| Jane |
| Bill |
| Zack |
+------+

SELECT name
FROM customer
WHERE referee_id IS NULL OR
      referee_id <> 2

sql/585.-medium-investments-in-2016.html.title: 585.(Medium) Investments in 2016
sql/585.-medium-investments-in-2016.html.body:
585.(Medium) Investments in 2016
| PID | TIV_2015 | TIV_2016 | LAT | LON |
|-----|----------|----------|-----|-----|
| 1   | 10       | 5        | 10  | 10  |
| 2   | 20       | 20       | 20  | 20  |
| 3   | 10       | 30       | 20  | 20  |
| 4   | 10       | 40       | 40  | 40  |

Output
| TIV_2016 |
|----------|
| 45.00    |

思路：

选出2015年投资数与他人有重合的policyholder（自查询1）
剔除LAT和LON与他人重合的policyholder（自查询2）

SELECT
    SUM(TIV_2016) TIV_2016
FROM
    insurance
WHERE
    PID IN (SELECT distinct a.PID 
                  FROM insurance a CROSS JOIN insurance b ON 
                  a.PID <> b.PID
                  WHERE a.TIV_2015 = b.TIV_2015)
    AND
    PID NOT IN (SELECT distinct a.PID 
                  FROM insurance a CROSS JOIN insurance b ON 
                  a.PID <> b.PID
                  WHERE a.LAT = b.LAT AND a.LON = b.LON)

sql/586.-easy-customer-placing-the-large.title: 586.(Easy) Customer Placing the Largest Number of Orders
sql/586.-easy-customer-placing-the-large.body:
586.(Easy) Customer Placing the Largest Number of Orders
orders

| order_number | customer_number | order_date | required_date | shipped_date | status | comment |
|--------------|-----------------|------------|---------------|--------------|--------|---------|
| 1            | 1               | 2017-04-09 | 2017-04-13    | 2017-04-12   | Closed |         |
| 2            | 2               | 2017-04-15 | 2017-04-20    | 2017-04-18   | Closed |         |
| 3            | 3               | 2017-04-16 | 2017-04-25    | 2017-04-20   | Closed |         |
| 4            | 3               | 2017-04-18 | 2017-04-28    | 2017-04-25   | Closed |         |

Output
| customer_number |
|-----------------|
| 3               |

考虑并列
SELECT customer_number
FROM orders
GROUP BY customer_number
HAVING COUNT(1) = (SELECT COUNT(1)
                   FROM orders
                   GROUP BY customer_number
                   ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC
                   LIMIT 1)

如果不需要考虑并列第一的情况
SELECT customer_number
FROM orders
GROUP BY customer_number
ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC
LIMIT 1

sql/595.-da-de-guo-jia-jian-dan.html.title: 595.(Easy) 大的国家
sql/595.-da-de-guo-jia-jian-dan.html.body:

FROM World

sql/596.-chao-guo-5-ming-xue-sheng-de-ke.title: 596.(Easy) 超过5名学生的课
sql/596.-chao-guo-5-ming-xue-sheng-de-ke.body:
596.(Easy) 超过5名学生的课
SELECT class
FROM courses
GROUP BY class
Having COUNT(DISTINCT student) > 4

这道题还有个小陷阱，- -
会有重复的records，不能直接用count(1)。

sql/597.-easy-friend-requests-i-overall-.title: 597.(Easy) Friend Requests I: Overall Acceptance Rate
sql/597.-easy-friend-requests-i-overall-.body:
597.(Easy) Friend Requests I: Overall Acceptance Rate
friend_request
| sender_id | send_to_id |request_date|
|-----------|------------|------------|
| 1         | 2          | 2016_06-01 |
| 1         | 3          | 2016_06-01 |
| 1         | 4          | 2016_06-01 |
| 2         | 3          | 2016_06-02 |
| 3         | 4          | 2016-06-09 |

request_accepted
| requester_id | accepter_id |accept_date |
|--------------|-------------|------------|
| 1            | 2           | 2016_06-03 |
| 1            | 3           | 2016-06-08 |
| 2            | 3           | 2016-06-08 |
| 3            | 4           | 2016-06-09 |
| 3            | 4           | 2016-06-10 |

|accept_rate|
|-----------|
|       0.80|

Note:

The accepted requests are not necessarily from the table friend_request. In this case, you just need to simply count the total accepted requests (no matter whether they are in the original requests), and divide it by the number of requests to get the acceptance rate.
It is possible that a sender sends multiple requests to the same receiver, and a request could be accepted more than once. In this case, the ‘duplicated’ requests or acceptances are only counted once.
If there is no requests at all, you should return 0.00 as the accept_rate.

SELECT
ROUND(
    IFNULL(
        (SELECT COUNT(distinct requester_id, accepter_id)
         FROM request_accepted)/ 
        (SELECT COUNT(distinct sender_id, send_to_id)
         FROM friend_request)
    ,0)
,2) accept_rate

sql/601.-ti-yu-guan-de-ren-liu-liang-kun.title: 601.(Hard) 体育馆的人流量
sql/601.-ti-yu-guan-de-ren-liu-liang-kun.body:
601.(Hard) 体育馆的人流量
stadium
+------+------------+-----------+
| id   | visit_date | people    |
+------+------------+-----------+
| 1    | 2017-01-01 | 10        |
| 2    | 2017-01-02 | 109       |
| 3    | 2017-01-03 | 150       |
| 4    | 2017-01-04 | 99        |
| 5    | 2017-01-05 | 145       |
| 6    | 2017-01-06 | 1455      |
| 7    | 2017-01-07 | 199       |
| 8    | 2017-01-08 | 188       |
+------+------------+-----------+

Output:
+------+------------+-----------+
| id   | visit_date | people    |
+------+------------+-----------+
| 5    | 2017-01-05 | 145       |
| 6    | 2017-01-06 | 1455      |
| 7    | 2017-01-07 | 199       |
| 8    | 2017-01-08 | 188       |
+------+------------+-----------+

Query 1 用外连接的方式
SELECT 
    s0.*
FROM
    stadium s0 LEFT JOIN 
    stadium s1 ON s1.id = s0.id + 1 LEFT JOIN
    stadium s2 ON s2.id = s0.id + 2 LEFT JOIN
    stadium s_1 ON s_1.id = s0.id - 1 LEFT JOIN
    stadium s_2 ON s_2.id = s0.id - 2
WHERE
    (s0.people > 99 AND s1.people > 99 AND s2.people > 99) OR
    (s_1.people > 99 AND s0.people > 99 AND s1.people > 99) OR
    (s_2.people > 99 AND s_1.people > 99 AND s0.people > 99)
ORDER BY s0.id

执行用时：318 ms , 在所有 MySQL 提交中击败了 91.31%
思想：1. 自连接得到「前后两天」的数据，2.分别对三种情况进行筛选。好处是不会筛选出重复记录。
Query 2 直接用WHERE连接
SELECT 
    DISTINCT a.*
FROM
    stadium a,
    stadium b,
    stadium c
WHERE
    ((b.id = a.id + 1 AND c.id = a.id + 2) OR   #a是第一天
     (b.id = a.id - 1 AND c.id = a.id + 1) OR   #a是第二天
     (b.id = a.id - 1 AND c.id = a.id - 2)) AND #a是第三天
    (a.people > 99 AND b.people > 99 AND c.people > 99)
ORDER BY a.id

执行用时 : 333 ms , 在所有 MySQL 提交中击败了 84.82% 
语法和逻辑上都要简单明了一些，但是会选出重复记录，执行效率也略微低一点。个人习惯「能用JOIN的时候尽量用JOIN」。

sql/602.-medium-friend-requests-ii-who-h.title: 602.(Medium) Friend Requests II: Who Has the Most Friends
sql/602.-medium-friend-requests-ii-who-h.body:
602.(Medium) Friend Requests II: Who Has the Most Friends
request_accepted
| requester_id | accepter_id | accept_date|
|--------------|-------------|------------|
| 1            | 2           | 2016_06-03 |
| 1            | 3           | 2016-06-08 |
| 2            | 3           | 2016-06-08 |
| 3            | 4           | 2016-06-09 |

Write a query to find the the people who has most friends and the most friends number.
| id | num |
|----|-----|
| 3  | 3   |

SELECT 
    id,
    COUNT(1) num
FROM
    (
        (SELECT requester_id id FROM request_accepted) 
            UNION ALL
        (SELECT accepter_id id FROM request_accepted) 
    ) a
GROUP BY
    id
ORDER BY
    num DESC
LIMIT 1

sql/603.-easy-consecutive-available-seat.title: 603.(Easy) Consecutive Available Seats
sql/603.-easy-consecutive-available-seat.body:
603.(Easy) Consecutive Available Seats
cinema
| seat_id | free |
|---------|------|
| 1       | 1    |
| 2       | 0    |
| 3       | 1    |
| 4       | 1    |
| 5       | 1    |

output
| seat_id |
|---------|
| 3       |
| 4       |
| 5       |

SELECT DISTINCT a.seat_id              -- 4前后座都空 会被选中2次 需去重
FROM
    cinema a JOIN cinema b ON
    ABS(a.seat_id - b.seat_id) = 1 AND -- 前座和后座
    a.free = 1 AND 
    b.free = 1
ORDER BY a.seat_id

sql/620.-you-qu-de-dian-ying-jian-dan.ht.title: 620.(Easy) 有趣的电影
sql/620.-you-qu-de-dian-ying-jian-dan.ht.body:
620.(Easy) 有趣的电影
SELECT *
FROM
    cinema
WHERE 
    description <> 'boring' AND
    id%2=1 
ORDER BY
    rating DESC

sql/626.-huan-zuo-wei-zhong-deng.html.title: 626.(Medium) 换座位
sql/626.-huan-zuo-wei-zhong-deng.html.body:
626.(Medium) 换座位
seat
+---------+---------+
|    id   | student |
+---------+---------+
|    1    | Abbot   |
|    2    | Doris   |
|    3    | Emerson |
|    4    | Green   |
|    5    | Jeames  |
+---------+---------+


Output
+---------+---------+
|    id   | student |
+---------+---------+
|    1    | Doris   |
|    2    | Abbot   |
|    3    | Green   |
|    4    | Emerson |
|    5    | Jeames  |
+---------+---------+

Solution 1. 用 coalesce() 和 case()
SELECT
    a.id id,
    COALESCE(b.student, a.student) student
FROM
    seat a LEFT JOIN seat b 
    ON b.id = (CASE 
               WHEN a.id%2=1 THEN a.id+1
               ELSE a.id-1
               END)
ORDER BY a.id

执行用时 : 269 ms , 在所有 MySQL 提交中击败了 97.19% 的用户
Solution 2. 用 ifnull() 和 if()
SELECT
    a.id id,
    IFNULL(b.student, a.student) student
FROM
    seat a LEFT JOIN seat b 
    ON b.id = IF(a.id%2=1, 
                 a.id+1, 
                 a.id-1)
ORDER BY a.id

执行用时 : 265 ms , 在所有 MySQL 提交中击败了 98.36% 的用户
Summary：似乎差不多效率，solution2是看的网友代码。CASE() 还是比 IF() 用处广一些，多练。

sql/627.-jiao-huan-gong-zi-jian-dan.html.title: 627.(Easy) 交换工资
sql/627.-jiao-huan-gong-zi-jian-dan.html.body:
627.(Easy) 交换工资
UPDATE salary
    SET sex = (CASE sex 
               WHEN 'm' THEN 'f'
               ELSE 'm'
               END)

jianzhi-offer/.title: 剑指offer
jianzhi-offer/.body:
剑指offer
剑指offer经典算法

jianzhi-offer/lian-xu-zi-shu-zu-zui-da-h.title: 连续子数组的最大和
jianzhi-offer/lian-xu-zi-shu-zu-zui-da-h.body:
连续子数组的最大和
Problem
计算连续子向量的最大和,当向量全为正数的时候,问题很好解决。但是,如果向量中包含负数,是否应该包含某个负数,并期望旁边的正数会弥补它呢？
例如:{6,-3,-2,7,-15,1,2,2},连续子向量的最大和为8(从第0个开始,到第3个为止)。给一个数组，返回它的最大连续子序列的和。(子向量的长度至少是1)
Solution
class Solution:
    def FindGreatestSumOfSubArray(self, array):
        max_sum = float("-inf")
        now_sum = 0
        for i in range(len(array)):
            now_sum += array.pop()
            max_sum = max(now_sum, max_sum)
            now_sum = max(0, now_sum)      
        return max_sum


遍历array的每一个元素
若某一环加上新元素得到的now_sum为负值，直接舍弃，从0开始；正值则继续保留，哪怕比前一环小。

jianzhi-offer/tiao-tai-jie.html.title: 跳台阶1
jianzhi-offer/tiao-tai-jie.html.body:
跳台阶
Problem
一只青蛙一次可以跳上1级台阶，也可以跳上2级……它也可以跳上n级。
求该青蛙跳上一个n级的台阶总共有多少种跳法。
Solution
递归问题
class Solution:
    def jumpFloor(self, n):
        if n==0 or n==1:
            return 1
        else:
            return 2*self.jumpFloor(n-1)

第一跳有n种情况：

跳1阶，剩下的n-1阶有f(n-1)种跳法
跳2阶，剩下的n-2阶有f(n-2)种跳法
……
跳n-1阶，剩下1阶有f(1)中跳法
跳n阶，就这一种跳法

 f(n) = f(n-1) + f(n-2) + … + f(1) + f(0) \\ f(n) = f(n-1) + f(n-1) \\f(n) = 2 * f(n-1)

jianzhi-offer/sum-of-1-to-n.html.title: 求1至n的和

jianzhi-offer/ju-xing-fu-gai.html.title: 2x1矩形覆盖
jianzhi-offer/ju-xing-fu-gai.html.body:
矩形覆盖
Problem
我们可以用2*1的小矩形横着或者竖着去覆盖更大的矩形。请问用n个2*1的小矩形无重叠地覆盖一个2*n的大矩形，总共有多少种方法？
Solution
class Solution:
    def rectCover(self,number):
        seq = [0,1,2]
        while number >= len(seq):
            seq.append(seq[-1]+seq[-2])
        return seq[number]

用递归其实思路更简单，但是python递归太慢了，OJ会判超时。
f(0) = 0\\ f(1) = 1 \\ f(2) = 2 \\f(3) =f(2) + f(1) \\…\\f(n) = f(n-1) + f(n-2) 
其实是一个Fibonacci sequence。对于一个2*n的大矩形，

第一块竖着摆剩下的有f(n-1)种情况，
第一块横着摆剩下的有f(n-2)种情况。
